languages.text: {n}Идира умолкает на мгновение. Когда она начинает говорить, ее шепот едва слышен.{/n} "Я знаю, о чем вы думаете. Тогда, в том варп-перелете... когда Леди Теодора вышла к нам... я все время думаю о той встрече. Все время виню себя... почему я не предвидела? Почему не остановила убийцу? День за днем эти мысли кружат на задворках разума... душат меня виной... и знаете, что? Та... на офицерской... я не знаю, что было там. А здесь... здесь было порождение моей вины. Обвинитель, пришедший из моего разума".

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира умолкает на мгновение. Когда она начинает говорить, ее шепот едва слышен.{/n} "Я знаю, о чем вы думаете. Тогда, в том варп-перелете... когда Леди Теодора вышла к нам... я все время думаю о той встрече. Все время виню себя... почему я не предвидела? Почему не остановила убийцу? День за днем эти мысли кружат на задворках разума... душат меня виной... и знаете, что? Та... на офицерской... я не знаю, что было там. А здесь... здесь было порождение моей вины. Обвинитель, пришедший из моего разума".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}She falls silent for a moment. When she next begins to speak, it is in a barely audible whisper.{/n} "I know what you're thinking. During the warp jump, when Lady Theodora came out toward us... I keep thinking about that meeting. I keep blaming myself... Why didn't I divine it? Why didn't I stop her killer? These thoughts have been playing at the back of my mind, day after day... choking me with guilt... and do you know what? The one... on the officers' deck... I don't know what that was. But this time... here... this was the product of my guilt. An accuser straight out of my own mind."

languages.text: {n}她沉默了一阵子。当她终于再次开口时，她的声音仿佛耳语一般，几乎难以听清。{/n}“我知道你在想什么。亚空间跳跃期间，当西奥多拉夫人朝我们走过来的时候……我一直都在想着那次见面，我不停地自责……为什么我没预见到那样的未来？为什么我没能阻止杀害她的凶手？这些想法在我脑海中回荡，日复一日……让我内疚得几乎喘不上气来……而且，你知道吗？那个……在军官甲板上见到的那个……我不知道那是怎么回事。但这个……这次这个……是我的内疚感造成的，我头脑中的意识始终在责难我自己。”
languages.original_text: {n}She falls silent for a moment. When she next begins to speak, it is in a barely audible whisper.{/n} "I know what you're thinking. During the warp jump, when Lady Theodora came out toward us... I keep thinking about that meeting. I keep blaming myself... Why didn't I divine it? Why didn't I stop her killer? These thoughts have been playing at the back of my mind, day after day... choking me with guilt... and do you know what? The one... on the officers' deck... I don't know what that was. But this time... here... this was the product of my guilt. An accuser straight out of my own mind."

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Guarda silencio por un momento. Cuando retoma la palabra, es un susurro prácticamente inaudible.{/n} «Sé lo que está pensando. Durante el salto de disformidad, cuando lady Theodora vino hacia nosotros... sigo pensando en ese encuentro. Sigo echándome la culpa... ¿Por qué no lo adiviné? ¿Por qué no detuve a quienquiera que la mató? Estos pensamientos se repiten en el fondo de mi mente día tras día... ahogándome en la culpa... ¿Sabe qué? Lo de... la cubierta de oficiales... no sé lo que fue. Pero esta vez... ahora... esto ha sido producto de mi culpa. Una acusadora salida de mi propia mente».
languages.original_text: {n}She falls silent for a moment. When she next begins to speak, it is in a barely audible whisper.{/n} "I know what you're thinking. During the warp jump, when Lady Theodora came out toward us... I keep thinking about that meeting. I keep blaming myself... Why didn't I divine it? Why didn't I stop her killer? These thoughts have been playing at the back of my mind, day after day... choking me with guilt... and do you know what? The one... on the officers' deck... I don't know what that was. But this time... here... this was the product of my guilt. An accuser straight out of my own mind."

Pero esta vez... ahora... esto ha sido producto de mi culpa. Una acusadora salida de mi propia mente».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}彼女はしばらく黙り込んだ。次に彼女が話し始めたとき、それはかろうじて聞こえる囁き声だった。{/n}「考えていることはわかるわ。ワープジャンプの最中にレディ・シオドーラがこちらに向かって出てきた…あの時のことをずっと考えていたの。自分を責めてばかりよ。なぜあたいはそれを予知できなかったの？なぜあたいは犯人を止められなかったの？そんな思いが、毎日、毎日、心の奥底で…罪悪感であたいの息をつまらせていた。あなたにわかる？あの…士官デッキの…あれは何だったのか。だけど今回は…これは…あたいの罪悪感の産物だった。あたい自身の心の中から出てきた告発者だったの」
languages.original_text: {n}She falls silent for a moment. When she next begins to speak, it is in a barely audible whisper.{/n} "I know what you're thinking. During the warp jump, when Lady Theodora came out toward us... I keep thinking about that meeting. I keep blaming myself... Why didn't I divine it? Why didn't I stop her killer? These thoughts have been playing at the back of my mind, day after day... choking me with guilt... and do you know what? The one... on the officers' deck... I don't know what that was. But this time... here... this was the product of my guilt. An accuser straight out of my own mind."

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sie verstummt einen Augenblick. Als sie wieder spricht, flüstert sie kaum hörbar.{/n} "Ich weiß, was Ihr denkt. Während des Warpsprungs, als Lady Theodora zu uns gekommen ist ... Ich denke immer wieder über dieses Treffen nach. Ich gebe mir selbst die Schuld ... Warum habe ich es nicht vorhergesehen? Warum habe ich ihren Mörder nicht aufgehalten? Diese Gedanken kreisen ständig in meinem Kopf, Tag für Tag. Ich ersticke an den Schuldgefühlen ... Und wisst Ihr was? Das auf dem Offiziersdeck ... Ich weiß nicht, was das war. Doch dieses Mal ... hier ... das war das Produkt meiner Schuld. Ein Vorwurf geradewegs aus meinem eigenen Verstand."
languages.original_text: {n}She falls silent for a moment. When she next begins to speak, it is in a barely audible whisper.{/n} "I know what you're thinking. During the warp jump, when Lady Theodora came out toward us... I keep thinking about that meeting. I keep blaming myself... Why didn't I divine it? Why didn't I stop her killer? These thoughts have been playing at the back of my mind, day after day... choking me with guilt... and do you know what? The one... on the officers' deck... I don't know what that was. But this time... here... this was the product of my guilt. An accuser straight out of my own mind."

Warum habe ich ihren Mörder nicht aufgehalten? Diese Gedanken kreisen ständig in meinem Kopf, Tag für Tag. Ich ersticke an den Schuldgefühlen ... Und wisst Ihr was? Das auf dem Offiziersdeck ... Ich weiß nicht, was das war. Doch dieses Mal ... hier ... das war das Produkt meiner Schuld. Ein Vorwurf geradewegs aus meinem eigenen Verstand."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Elle se tait un instant, avant de reprendre la parole d'un filet de voix presque inaudible.{/n} « Je sais ce que vous pensez... Pendant le saut Warp, quand dame Théodora est venue à nous... Je n'arrête pas d'y repenser. Je m'en veux tellement... Comment se fait-il que je n'aie rien vu venir ? Pourquoi n'ai-je pas réussi à arrêter son assassin ? Jour après jour, ces pensées tournent en boucle dans ma tête... je suis rongée par la culpabilité... et vous savez quoi ? L'apparition, sur le pont des officiers... Je ne sais pas d'où elle venait. Cette fois, en revanche... celle que nous avons vue ici même... c'était le pur produit de ma conscience tourmentée. Une manifestation accusatrice tout droit sortie de mon esprit malade. »
languages.original_text: {n}She falls silent for a moment. When she next begins to speak, it is in a barely audible whisper.{/n} "I know what you're thinking. During the warp jump, when Lady Theodora came out toward us... I keep thinking about that meeting. I keep blaming myself... Why didn't I divine it? Why didn't I stop her killer? These thoughts have been playing at the back of my mind, day after day... choking me with guilt... and do you know what? The one... on the officers' deck... I don't know what that was. But this time... here... this was the product of my guilt. An accuser straight out of my own mind."

Pourquoi n'ai-je pas réussi à arrêter son assassin ? Jour après jour, ces pensées tournent en boucle dans ma tête... je suis rongée par la culpabilité... et vous savez quoi ? L'apparition, sur le pont des officiers... Je ne sais pas d'où elle venait. Cette fois, en revanche... celle que nous avons vue ici même... c'était le pur produit de ma conscience tourmentée. Une manifestation accusatrice tout droit sortie de mon esprit malade. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Bir anlığına sessizleşiyor. Konuşmaya tekrar başladığında ise sesi zar zor duyulacak şekilde fısıldıyor.{/n} "Ne düşündüğünü biliyorum. Öte sıçrama sırasında Leydi Theodora bize saldırdığında... O buluşmayı düşünüp durdum. Kendimi suçlamadan edemiyorum... Neden olacakları önceden bilemedim? Neden onun katilini durduramadım? Bu düşünceler günlerce zihnimin bir kenarında dönüp durdu. Suçluluk duygusuyla boğuştum... Fakat bir şeyden eminim. Subay güvertesindeki... O şey... Ne olduğunu bilmiyorum. Şimdi buradakiyse... Benim suçluluk duygumdan doğan bir şeydi. Kendi zihnim beni suçluyordu."
languages.original_text: {n}She falls silent for a moment. When she next begins to speak, it is in a barely audible whisper.{/n} "I know what you're thinking. During the warp jump, when Lady Theodora came out toward us... I keep thinking about that meeting. I keep blaming myself... Why didn't I divine it? Why didn't I stop her killer? These thoughts have been playing at the back of my mind, day after day... choking me with guilt... and do you know what? The one... on the officers' deck... I don't know what that was. But this time... here... this was the product of my guilt. An accuser straight out of my own mind."

Bu düşünceler günler boyu zihnimin bir kenarında dönüp durdu. Suçluluk duygusuyla boğuştum... Fakat bir şeyden eminim. Subay güvertesindeki... O şey... Ne olduğunu bilmiyorum. Şimdi, buradakiyse... Bu, benim suçluluk duygumdan doğan bir şeydi. Kendi zihnim beni suçluyordu."
